testcase.name: Load Home Page
Measure Home Page Load Time
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Measure Home Page Load Time Given the web browser is currently open ... passed in 1.941s When the user navigates to url "https://www.thejournal.ie" ... passed in 1.063s Then the "home" page loads successfully ... passed in 0.126s And the page load time is under "3000" milliseconds ... passed in 0.007s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Load Business Section
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Load Business Section Given the url "https://www.thejournal.ie" is currently open ... passed in 0.939s When the user selects "Business" from the navigation bar ... passed in 1.292s Then the "business" page loads successfully ... passed in 0.189s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Verify that articles load and author name is populated -- @1.1
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario Outline: Verify that articles load and author name is populated -- @1.1 Given the url "https://www.thejournal.ie/business" is currently open ... passed in 1.136s When the user selects article "1" ... passed in 3.515s Then the "article" page loads successfully ... passed in 0.477s And the author name is populated ... passed in 0.044s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
